meanings.definition: A type of edible marine mollusk.
meanings.sent1: The ormer was delicious when cooked with butter.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy eating ormers at seaside restaurants.
meanings.sent3: The ormer decided to throw a party in its shell.
meanings.sent4: The ormer's shell was a treasure chest of flavors.
meanings.sent5: Children love to search for ormers along the shore.

meanings.sent1: I will ormer along the beach to find some for dinner.

meanings.sent3: The chef ormered the ingredients for the special dish.
meanings.sent4: She ormered memories of her childhood to write a book.
meanings.sent5: The detective had to ormer for clues in the dark.

meanings.definition: The act of searching for ormers.
meanings.sent1: Ormering is a popular activity for families on vacation.
meanings.sent2: The ormering competition drew participants from all over.
meanings.sent3: The ormering event turned into a friendly race.
meanings.sent4: His ormering skills were unmatched along the coast.
